alert.note: Alert for Custer; Lincoln (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 4:43AM CDT until July 29 at 5:30AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Lincoln County in southwestern Nebraska... Custer County in central Nebraska... * Until 530 AM CDT. * At 443 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Berwyn to 9 miles northeast of Gothenburg, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Broken Bow, Callaway, Sargent, Ansley, Merna, Mason City, Oconto, Comstock, Berwyn, Weissert, Westerville, Lillian, Lodi, Buckeye, Round Valley, Etna, Milldale, Arcadia Diversion Dam State Wildlife Management Area, Burr Oak and Gavin Siding. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 73 and 114. Highway 2 between mile markers 267 and 307. Highway 92 between mile markers 270 and 308. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
